name: Writer
description:
Serialize the canvas document into a JSON object which can be read from the corresponding {@link draw2d.io.json.Reader}.

// Create a JSON writer and convert it into a JSON-String representation.
//
var writer = new draw2d.io.json.Writer();
writer.marshal(canvas, function(json){
   // convert the json object into string representation
   var jsonTxt = JSON.stringify(json,null,2);

   // insert the json string into a DIV for preview or post
   // it via ajax to the server....
   $("#json").text(jsonTxt);

});

functions.name: marshal
functions.description:
Export the content to the implemented data format. Inherit class implements content specific writer.

Method signature has been changed from version 2.10.1 to version 3.0.0.
The parameter resultCallback is required and new. The method calls the callback instead of return the result.

parameters.name: resultCallback
parameters.description: the method to call on success. The first argument is the result object, the second the base64 representation of the file content

parameters.name: resultCallback.base64
parameters.description: the canvas document as base encoded JSON
